Header: Troops Avert Tank Bund Split in Palampiddi
Content: Upon observation of a leakage along the Payankulam tank bund which provides water to Palampiddi area, troops of the 613 Brigade under the 61 Division immediately began repairs to avert a major disaster on Saturday (6) due to increasing water levels. 32 military personnel of the 613 Brigade actively contributed to the repair on the bund by plastering and placing sand bags around the affected area. 613 Brigade Commander, Colonel R.K.N.C Jayawardane supervised the repair work on the instructions of the General Officer Commanding, 61 Division.
